attributes.action: Provide a factual report on the impact of rejecting Lords amendment -article 50
attributes.additional_details:
I say believe because its so difficult to find actual facts about this, who can you trust?

We voted to leave the EU.

Did we vote to remove the rights of people who live in Britain?

If you voted remain and want the government to reconsider the amendment to article 50 from the lords, then sign this petition.

If you voted leave and did not think you were voting to remove rights from people who already live here, then sign this petition.
attributes.background:
Call for a statistical and factual report on the impact of rejecting the Lords amendment to article 50 before triggering Brexit. 
I believe this would have guaranteed rights for 3.3m EU nationals living in Britain before Brexit (Just a small delay on a huge change)

rejection.details:
As Prime Minister Theresa May has written to European Council President Donald Tusk to notify him of the UK’s intention to leave the EU, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182723
